alert.note: Alert for Amelia; Chesterfield; Goochland; Nottoway; Powhatan (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 29 at 7:06PM EDT until July 29 at 7:45PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: The National Weather Service in Wakefield has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Chesterfield County in central Virginia... Northern Nottoway County in south central Virginia... Southeastern Goochland County in central Virginia... Amelia County in central Virginia... Powhatan County in central Virginia... * Until 745 PM EDT. * At 706 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Macon to near Burkeville, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and powerlines. * Locations impacted include... Powhatan, Mannboro, Moseley, Amelia Courthouse, Jetersville, Tobaccoville, Morven, Scotts Fork, Chula, Macon, Spainville, Ballsville, North Wellville, Earls, Pilkinton, Winterham, Skinquarter, Wellville, Maplewood, and Fergusonville. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Please report severe weather by calling 757-899-2415, posting to the NWS Wakefield Facebook page, or using Twitter @NWSWAKEFIELDVA.
